name: @elizaos/plugin-planning-root
description: Comprehensive planning and execution plugin for elizaOS with benchmarking capabilities

scripts.build: npm run build:prompts && bun run build:ts && bun run build:rust && bun run build:python
scripts.build:rust: test -d rust && cd rust && cargo build --release || echo 'Rust build skipped - no rust directory'
scripts.build:python: test -d python && cd python && (python3 -m build 2>/dev/null || pyproject-build) || echo 'Python build skipped - no python directory'
scripts.build:wasm: cd rust && wasm-pack build --target web --features wasm
scripts.test: bun run test:ts && bun run test:rust && bun run test:python
scripts.test:ts: cd typescript && vitest run || echo 'TypeScript tests skipped - no tests found'
scripts.test:python: test -d python && cd python && pytest -p no:anchorpy --asyncio-mode=auto || echo 'Python tests skipped'
scripts.benchmark: bun run benchmark:ts && bun run benchmark:python
scripts.benchmark:ts: bun run typescript/src/benchmarks/benchmark-runner.ts || echo 'Benchmarks require runtime setup'
scripts.benchmark:python: cd python && python3 -m elizaos_plugin_planning.benchmarks.cli --all || echo 'Python benchmarks require dependencies'
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist typescript/dist python/dist rust/target .turbo node_modules
scripts.lint:rust: cd rust && cargo clippy --all-targets --fix --allow-dirty --allow-staged -- -D warnings && cargo fmt
scripts.lint:python: cd python && ruff check --fix . && ruff format .
scripts.lint:python:fix: cd python && ruff check --fix . && ruff format .

author: elizaOS Team

PLANNING_MAX_STEPS.description: Maximum steps allowed in a single plan

PLANNING_TIMEOUT_MS.description: Default timeout for plan execution in milliseconds
